Controller¶

class controller.ClosedLoop(KP: float, KI=0.0, KD=0.0, KFF=0.0)¶

Implement Closed-loop Control (PID) with Feed Forward for a given system

Initializes Closed-loop Controller Object

Parameters:

  • KP – Proportional Controller Gain

  • KI – Integral Controller Gain

  • KD – Derivative Controller Gain

  • KFF – Feed Forward Gain

KD¶

Derivative Controller Gain

KFF¶

Feed Forward Gain

KI¶

Integral Controller Gain

KP¶

Proportional Controller Gain

controller(setpoint, feedback, feedforward=0.0) → tuple¶

Run 1 loop of closed-loop feedback PID controller with given setpoint and feedback, assume consistent units

Parameters:

  • setpoint – Setpoint value for controller

  • feedback – Feedback value for controller

  • feedforward – Feedforward value for controller

Return P_power,I_power,D_power,F_power:

Outputs for Proportional, Integral, Derivative, and Feedforward controllers

integral_err¶

Integral of error in consistent units

prev_err¶

Previous error in consistent units

prev_ticks¶

Previous time (us)

reset()¶

Reset error values for clean initial start-up

MECHA03 ROMI
